short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Activate this extension to open the side panel. Search for anything, and get result in new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With no Hassle, quickly search for the web while you surf. Install our Search Side Panel chrome extension which makes your browsing more comfortable by adding a feature-rich side panel. The panel extension on the side enables you to search anything directly on the web without navigating to another page. 

 Simply input your search, explore results as well as clicking to open them in a different tab. With no hassle, get into research and shopping as never before! 

Key features of side search panel chrome extension 

Side Panel Access: At any time, open the side panel for quick searches without disturbing your browsing.  

Seamless Integration: Provides a browser extension which is easy to find and use.  

Fast Search: Quickly, search the internet for anything you need without leaving the web page that you are on.  

One-Click Results: Look at the search results in the side panel and open the desired links in new tabs with just one click.  

 How to use this chrome extension 

 1: Enable the Add-on 

Let us go to the Google Web Store.  

Look for the "Search Side Panel" chrome extension.  

Click on "Add to Chrome" and confirm it by clicking "Add extension".  

 2: Open the Side Bar.  

After the installation is completed, click on the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar.  

The side panel will be launched on the side of your browser window.  

 3: Conduct a search query 

In the side panel, you will find the search bar.  

Press "Enter" or click on the search button to begin the search process.  

 4: View Results  

Look through the search results that will be shown on the right panel.  

Move your cursor over a result to get a short description or a preview.  

Clicking on a result will open it in a new tab.  

 To Whom Is It Useful? 

The "Search Side Panel" Chrome extension is a very helpful tool to a diverse group of users such as researchers, students, multitaskers, online shoppers, content creators, professionals, and casual browsers. Through this, a handy side bar for instant web searches that do not interrupt the browsing process is created, which in turn increases productivity and efficiency.  

Whatever purpose the user has for searching, be it to perform research, compare prices while shopping, get inspiration for content creation, or just explore the topics of interest, this extension automates the process by keeping the search results in the browser window. It's perfect match with the userâ€™s needs and the time-saving features, this "Search Side Panel" extension is designed for individuals who are looking for convenience and efficiency in their online activities. 

Why Is It Useful? 

It is useful because opening the 'Search Side Panel' extension for Chrome is incredibly convenient, and then a small search box appears right on the side. As for the web searches, you can just type in the words or phrases you like, and the results will appear right there on the same page without the need to switch tabs or leave the site you are browsing.  

It is like you have a friendly little search assistant right there with you, which makes it simple to find whatever you need without any inconvenience. Regardless of if you are doing research for school, bargain hunting when shopping online or just wants to learn something new, this extension is beyond easy to use as it completely takes you out of the struggle to look for stuff on the web.  

FAQs 

 1. How can I see the panel if I have the extension already? 

The extension icon in the Chrome toolbar gives you instant access to the side panel. 

2. May I be able to make some changes in the side panel's appearance or location? 

 
Consequently, your choice currently doesn't include customization and changing the look of side panel or its position.  

3. Does it work with all the websites and search engines? 

Indeed, it is not only a service offered by most websites, but it also goes hand in hand with the major search engines.  

4. Is it possible to disable or uninstall the extension if it is not of use anymore? 

Yes, the extension icon will appear when you right-click on it and you will be able to disable or uninstall it from Chrome.
